post.body: Hi Liz. Have u tried tweetdeck? You cant officially search your whole database but the filter tools on yr feed are rather nifty.
INot fair is it? they work so hard all term & then 2 poorly 2 enjoy the last few days. But my 6YO is enjoying his all day TV!
Carol concert at school tonight. 8YO singing in junior choir so think I had better take tissues! Get well soon. 2 many bugs!
thanks for the shout-out Gary. Glad you have found tweetlater. Nice little tool :)
Definitely a PJ Christmas :0) At home, in front of a log fire & elasticated trousers so I can eat as much as I like!
Yes, I think you are right. @tomchurch has just suggested that is those with the most followers who are displayed.
Thks, yes that makes sense :)
Thanks - I was looking for a system to use next year. I like the pay as you go option. Will have a play in Jan.
You ask about email mkting & social media - What sort of help do you need?
@workingnature Glad you both like my naff taste in jokes :) It is the christmas cracker season after all!
Santaclausaphobics?
Sounds like an average day in the Skidmore household ;o) Just dont try & do emails whilst cooking. Something always burns!!
You would think, wouldnt you! Ha Ha
Thks Gary. I've just booked dinner with Mickey at the Mickey Cafe. But decided against the Wild West show. Â£50 a ticket! Wow!
Congrats Ian & if u r ever in Surrey/Berkshire neighbourhood I run 3 networking events each mth. Good speakers only ;o)
Have just scoffed a mince pie so am helping towards the greater landmass of Europe, too :O)
Louise - I have been dreaming in tweets for weeks now - never mind thinking in them! So yes, you have it bad. LOL
Working around my sick 6YO who can't go to school today. Bad cold & missing all the fun of last day of term :o(
Answer 2 Xmas Joke Part 2: "Still no idea!" Thks to @nikkipilkington for joining in on that one. Oh & I wont tweet the 3rd part. Too rude!
Have you suddenly found your diary go quiet next week? Then make the most of having a clear week & plan your 2009 projects. Get ahead 4 Jan
Christmas Joke Part 2: What do you call a reindeer with no eyes & no legs?
Christmas Joke Answer: "No Idea!" Ha Ha. Thks to @ralphbassfield @momstrade & @coachclaire who all got the right answer ;o)
Christmas Joke: What do you call a Reindeer with no eyes?
Coaches - have you checked out @HannahMcNamara awesome teleclass next week? "Will Recession Kill Off Coaching?" http://snipr.com/7rxbr
#CDCBTip Use Tweetlater & you could be tweeting your best top tips even when you are not at your PC.
Finishing off the new look CanDoCanBe Networking newsletter & sending out today. Got some great speakers lined up in Jan. Very excited :)
Going to concentrate on watching "Never mind the buzzcocks" - Night night :)
Does anyone know how twitter decides on which tweeps you are following are displayed on your profile page?
Have a great Christmas everyone. Last tweet of the year and will be back with more, more, more in 2009. Tweet you all soon!
Learn how to use the internet to boost your business & network at the same time. Crowthorne Womens Network: http://snipr.com/8sw3i
#CDCBTwitterTip Remember the international timezones of yr tweeps. Use tweetlater to schedule tweets when yr asleep & yr followers are awake
Naff Christmas Joke: What's the best xmas present to give? A broken drum - you just can't beat it! Ha Ha!
#CDCBFacebookTip Group yr friends in lists. Get way of sending targeted messages 2 targeted grps of people (in moderation of course!)
Ladies in SE England - are you free on Tuesday 20th Jan? We've got @grahamjones speaking at Crowthorne Womens Network http://is.gd/cisd
#CDCBFacebookTip If you are adding yr birthday to be visible on yr profile, avoid adding the year. Remember online security at all times!
Listening to Steve Wright on Radio 2, while my kids are practising for a nativity play that I am sure I will have to watch very soon :)
#CDCBTwitterTip Use the # key infront of a word & it will give people the option to click & view a search result of all tweets using this
RT @alunrichards: Q: How does Father Christmas like his pizza? A: Deep pan, crisp and even. (Loving the Xmas Jokes that are being tweeted!)
Christmas Present Idea for the man who has everything: http://snipr.com/8mrak Check out the customer reviews, too!!
Just choosing which restaurant we are going to eat in on our first night at EuroDisney! Yeah - I'm getting excited @ Xmas with Mickey!!
